com.syntax.manage

Interface SyntaxCaretListener


  • public interface SyntaxCaretListener
    Listening for caret updating in SyntaxTextArea
    See Also:
    SyntaxTextArea

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void caretUpdate(javax.swing.text.JTextComponent component, java.awt.Rectangle r, int position, TextBody textBody, SyntaxHighlightingTool highlightTool)
      When caret of SyntaxTextArea updats, this method is used as callback method

    • Method Detail

      • caretUpdate

        void caretUpdate(javax.swing.text.JTextComponent component,
                 java.awt.Rectangle r,
                 int position,
                 TextBody textBody,
                 SyntaxHighlightingTool highlightTool)
        When caret of SyntaxTextArea updats, this method is used as callback method
        Parameters:
        component - text component of SyntaxTextArea. Use this component to locate caret position in coordinate
        r - representing shape of caret on SyntaxTextArea
        position - caret position in SyntaxTextArea
        textBody - entire paragraph of SyntaxTextArea
        highlightTool - support highlight text on SyntaxTextArea
